english.segment1: If all I've done. At last should come to nothing. And all I love, like sand be washed away
english.segment2: Still I will sing. Of Your unfailing glory. On bended knee. I'll lift my voice and say
english.segment3: Great is the Lord. Great is Your name. Till my last breath. I will proclaim
english.segment4: Great is the Lord. Great is Your name. I give my life. To sing Your praise
english.segment5: If You should speak. Or should remain in silence. Should give me light, or lead me through the dark
english.segment6: Whatever the cost. Whatever joy or sorrow. I'll worship still. Because of who You are
english.segment7: When death becomes. The end of all my labors. And Christ alone my rest and reward
english.segment8: May all I've done. Be one enduring echo. Resounding on to shout. Great is the Lord
